org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal
Interface AbstractRemoteIdentityAPI

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
EJB2IdentityAPI, RemoteIdentityAPI, RESTRemoteIdentityAPI
public interface AbstractRemoteIdentityAPI
extends Remote

Author:
Elias Ricken de Medeiros, Matthieu Chaffotte

addUser

User addUser(String username,
             String password,
             String firstName,
             String lastName,
             String title,
             String jobTitle,
             String managerUserUUID,
             Map<String,String> profileMetadata,
             Map<String,String> options)
             throws RemoteException,
                    UserAlreadyExistsException,
                    UserNotFoundException,
                    MetadataNotFoundException
Create a new user

Parameters:
username - the user's username
password - the user's password
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
title - the user's title
jobTitle - the user's job title
managerUserUUID - the user's manager's UUID
profileMetadata - the user's profile metadata where the key of the map should be the name of one of the defined profile metadata
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
the User created
Throws:
RemoteException
UserAlreadyExistsException
UserNotFoundException
MetadataNotFoundException

importUser

User importUser(String userUUID,
                String username,
                String passwordHash,
                String firstName,
                String lastName,
                String title,
                String jobTitle,
                String managerUserUUID,
                Map<String,String> profileMetadata,
                Map<String,String> options)
                throws RemoteException,
                       UserAlreadyExistsException,
                       MetadataNotFoundException
Import a user

Parameters:
userUUID - the user UUID (should be URL compliant)
username - the user's username
passwordHash - the hash of the user's password
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
title - the user's title
jobTitle - the user's job title
managerUserUUID - the user's manager's UUID
profileMetadata - the user's profile metadata where the key of the map should be the name of one of the defined profile metadata
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
the User created
Throws:
RemoteException
UserAlreadyExistsException
MetadataNotFoundException

getUsersInRole

List<User> getUsersInRole(String roleUUID,
                          int fromIndex,
                          int numberOfUsers,
                          UserCriterion pagingCriterion,
                          Map<String,String> options)
                          throws RoleNotFoundException,
                                 RemoteException
Retrieve a limited number of the users in a role (for paginated UI) order by the given pagingCriterion

Parameters:
roleUUID - the role UUID
fromIndex - start index
numberOfUsers - maximum number of users retrieved
pagingCriterion - the criterion used to sort the retrieved users

a List of User
